entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 9 except plus 5 in onshore winds. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High 9 except plus 5 in onshore winds. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Monday 8 May 2023
